issue.title: [Rust][Datafusion] table scan without projection should return all columns
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-9184](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-9184). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
Projection should be optional if user already want to fetch all columns

comments.body:
***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-9184?focusedCommentId=17147087) by Andy Grove (andygrove):*
Issue resolved by pull request 7494
